name: Minute Break
description:
Minute Break is a micro-game created in 1 hour for the "one hour rpgmaker jam". (excluding time cleaning unused files and packaging)

As Thief and Wizard, try to break your friend Fighter out of jail. All three characters' abilities will be needed to escape.

This game is a demo of a game mechanic that can be completed in a minute or two. Due to the time constraints of the jam, there are bugs remaining and it is not at all polished.

Controls:

Arrow Keys to Move
Z or Enter to interact
Shift to Switch between character being controlled
